title: How do I know COVID-19 vaccines are safe without long-term data?
cleaned_text: How do I know COVID-19 vaccines are safe without long-term data?Organization: [Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)](/search?topic[]=227) Published: 2021 "Clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccines have been taking place since the spring of 2020 and millions of people around the world have already been vaccinated." - How do I know COVID-19 vaccines are safe without long-term data?
